resources.string: Would you like to remove this contact? The conversation associated with this contact will not be removed.
Would you like to block this Contact?
Would you like to unblock %s and allow them to send you messages?
Would you like remove this group?
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Conversations\nWarning: This will use your XMPP account to send the stack trace to the developer.
Unable to connect to multiple accounts
Touch here to manage your accounts
The contact is not in your roster. Would you like to add it?
Do you want to delete all messages within this Conversation?\n\nWarning: This will not influence messages stored on other devices or servers.
Decryption failed. Maybe you don’t have the proper private key.

Conversations utilizes a third party app called OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and to manage your public keys.

OpenKeychain is licensed under GPLv3 and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart Conversations afterwards.)

string.name: encrypted_message_received
string.i: Encrypted message received. Touch to view and decrypt.

resources.string: The name this client identifies itself with
Notify when a new message arrives
Also vibrate when a new message arrives
Always notify when a message arrives in a public conference instead of only when highlighted
Disable notifications for a short time after a carbon copy was received
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Conversations
Let your contact know when you have received and read a message
Preemptively grant and ask for presence subscription for contacts you created
The file you selected is not an image
Error while converting the image file
General I/O error. Maybe you ran out of storage space?
The app you used to select this image did not provide us with enough permissions to read the file.\n\nUse a different file manager to choose an image
If you delete your account your entire conversation history will be lost
This is not a valid Jabber ID
Out of memory. Image is too large
Do you want to add %s to your phones contact list?
Encrypted message. Please install OpenKeychain to decrypt.
You need to know the username of your friend!
Contact added you to contact list
%s has read up to this point
Touch avatar to select picture from gallery
Please note: Everyone subscribed to your presence updates will be allowed to see this picture.
Something went wrong while converting your picture
Could not save avatar to disk
(Or long press to bring back default)
Your server does not support the publication of avatars
Please request presence updates from your contact first.\n\nThis will be used to determine what client(s) your contact is using.
Are you sure you would like to delete this fingerprint?
Warning: Sending this without mutual presence updates could cause unexpected problems.\n\nGo to contact details to verify your presence subscriptions.
Always send messages encrypted (except for Groups)
Warning: This could lead to message loss

Notifications will be silenced during quiet hours
Use larger font sizes across the entire app
Received messages will be marked with a green tick if supported
Colorize send button to indicate contact status
Use room’s subject instead of JID to identify Groups
You are banned from this Group
You have been kicked from this Group
You are not connected. Try again later
Prevents the operating system from killing your connection
No application found to open file
Are you sure you want to clear all keys? The next time your devices connect, they will reannounce themselves, but they might not receive messages sent in the meantime.
Are you sure you want to purge this key?
It will irreversibly be considered compromised, and you can never build a session with it again.
There are no usable keys available for this contact. If you have purged any of their keys, they need to generate new ones.

If you and your contact have a secret in common that no one else knows (like an inside joke or simply what you had for lunch the last time you met) you can use that secret to verify each other’s fingerprints.\n\nYou provide a hint or a question for your contact who will respond with a case-sensitive answer.
Your contact would like to verify your fingerprint by challenging you with a shared secret. Your contact provided the following hint or question for that secret.
Your hint should not be empty
Your shared secret can not be empty
Carefully compare the fingerprint shown below with the fingerprint of your contact.\nYou can use any trusted form of communication like an encrypted e-mail or a telephone call to exchange those.
You are trying to remove %s from a public conference. The only way to do that is to ban that user for ever.
Use enter key to send message
Change the emoticons key to an enter key
Let your contact know when you are writing a new message
No application found to display location
All certificates must be manually approved
Replace send button with quick action
This is not a valid username
Download failed: Could not connect to host
Show received messages as black text on a white background
Marks your resource as away when the screen is turned off
Marks your resource as not available when phone is in silent mode
Leave empty to authenticate w/ certificate
enter the text from the image
Jabber ID does not match certificate
Location sharing is disabled in settings
Tunnel all connections through the TOR network. Requires Orbot
This is not a valid port number
This is not a valid hostname
Conversations need access to external storage

Conversations wants to match your XMPP roster with your contacts to show their full names and avatars.\n\nConversations will only read your contacts and match them locally without uploading them to your server.
Your phone is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Conversations that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss. It is recommended to disable those.
Your phone is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Conversations that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\n\nYou will now be asked to disable those.
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nFetching new keys from the server has been unsuccessful. Maybe there is something wrong with your contacts server.
The selected area is too large
Show hostname and port options when setting up an account
Respect the autojoin flag in conference bookmarks
You are no longer in this conference
You already trust this contact. By selecting \'done\' you are just confirming that %s is part of this conference.
Marks your resource as not available when device is on vibrate
Blink notification light when a new message arrives
No application found to share URI
If you want to use FlowX, you have to join or register a new Account .
Hide or show your Status Message
Set for all accounts on this device
A secure password has been generated
Your device does not support opting out of battery optimization

Version %1$s is available.

Filesize: %2$s

Update to version %1$s now?

FlowX Messenger is checking for an update. If an update is available you will be asked, if you want to update your version. The update process is downloading and installing the new version automatically.\n\nPlease wait…
There is a backup on your device which can be imported.\nPossibly you will be asked to uninstall the old version, your Messenger will be restarted during backup process. Shall the backup be imported?

There is an old version of FlowX Messenger or Conversations installed. If you have an old FlowX Messenger installed, you should uninstall this version. After uninstalled the old versoin, you should choose \'import backup\' again and we will import your data to the new version.
We have integrated the VoiceRecorder and ShareLocation plugin directly into the messenger. You should uninstall the plugins.
This is your Username to identified you by friends. This Username is not changeable and will show as your name.

FlowX will ask you to allow a few permissions. It is important that you allow all these permissions to use all features of this messenger. If you deny any of these permissions the app will close itself.
You have denied some or all permissions needed for FlowX. Would you like to jump to the settings and allow these permissions? If you denie any of these permissions, the app will close itself.
Let all your contacts know when you use FlowX
Download failed: Could not write file
Report this User as sending unwanted messages.
This file seems to be corrupt.
This device is no longer in use
Accept files in mobile roaming connections
You need to be connected to publish your avatar.
Regenerate your OMEMO keys. All your contacts will have to verify you again. Use this only as a last resort.
All OMEMO keys have been verified
Automatically trust all new devices from contacts that haven’t been verified before.
Barcode does not contain fingerprints for this conversation.
Use the camera to scan a contacts barcode
Please wait for keys to be fetched
